snackbarMessage.error: There was a problem, please try again.
snackbarMessage.CREDENTIALS_REQUIRED: Your session has expired. Please login again.
snackbarMessage.GAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: The game with this season and game number already exists.
snackbarMessage.USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: There is already an account with this username.
snackbarMessage.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: There is already an account with this email.
snackbarMessage.TEAM_ALREADY_EXISTS: The team with this name already exists. Enter a different team name.
snackbarMessage.JOIN_TEAM_REQUEST: Your request to join the team has been sent successfully.
snackbarMessage.JOIN_REQUEST_ALREADY_SENT: You already requested to join this team.
snackbarMessage.JOIN_REQUEST_ACCEPTED: The member was accepted to the team.
snackbarMessage.JOIN_REQUEST_DECLINED: The member was not accepted to the team.
snackbarMessage.KICK_MEMBER_SUCCESSFULLY: The member was kicked from the team.
snackbarMessage.LEADER_UPDATED_SUCCESSFULLY: The new leader was updated successfully.
snackbarMessage.EMAIL_NOT_SENT: Your email could not be sent. Please try again later.
